component.name: getUserDetails
component.description: Gets details of a user by user ID.

component.description: Adds an achievement for a user.

component.name: sendAppRequest
component.description: Sends an app request to other users.

component.description: Adds a post to the user's feed.

component.description: To determine whether that tow users are friend with each other.

component.description: Publish a photo to user profile.
